Configure Project/Archive Branching

Use the Configure Project dialog box (Admin | Configure Project | General Tab | Archives | Branching) to set up projects for automatic branching and merging. Before you set up automatic branching, you must place version labels on the revisions from which you want to start a branch. For more information, see the Serena ChangeMan Version Manager Administrator's Guide.

Field Descriptions

Archives | Branching
Base Version Enter the version label that you assigned to mark the revision from which you want to start a branch.
Branch Version Enter the version label that you assigned to the tip of the branch. Initially, this will be the revision from which you want to branch.
Default Version Enter the version label you specified for the Branch Version option.
Warn before locking for branch Select this check box so that Version Manager will display a message telling users that if they check out the revision with a lock, a branch will be created when the workfile is checked back in.
